verses.name: Hosea 8:1
verses.text: Set the trumpet to thy mouth. He shall come as an eagle against the house of the Lord, because they have transgressed my covenant, and trespassed against my law.

verses.name: Hosea 8:2
verses.text: Israel shall cry unto me, My God, we know thee.

verses.name: Hosea 8:3
verses.text: Israel hath cast off the thing that is good: the enemy shall pursue him.

verses.name: Hosea 8:4
verses.text: They have set up kings, but not by me: they have made princes, and I knew it not: of their silver and their gold have they made them idols, that they may be cut off.
